text: Daniel Louis Schorr (August 31, 1916 â€“ July 23, 2010)Journalism Legend Daniel Schorr Dies At 93 was an American journalist. He covered world news for more than 60 years. He was a Senior News Analyst for National Public Radio (NPR) before his death. Schorr won three Emmy Awards for his television journalism. ==References== ==Other websites== *Daniel Schorr on Twitter *Obituary at The New York Times Category:Emmy Award winners Category:1916 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Journalists from New York City Category:Writers from the Bronx
title: Daniel Schorr
